file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Kiwi API
  description: 'Kiwi'
  contact:
    email: marius@xn--gckvb8fzb.com
  license:
    name: GNU GPLv3
    url: https://github.com/mrusme/kiwi/blob/master/LICENSE
  version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
  description: Find out more about Kiwi
  url: https://mrusme.github.io/kiwi/
servers:
- url: http://kiwi.local
tags:
- name: settings
  description: Global settings
- name: keys
  description: Key configurations
- name: animations
  description: Animation configurations
paths:
  /settings:
    post:
      tags:
      - settings
      summary: Bulk upsert settings
      operationId: upsertSettings
      requestBody:
        description: Bulk upsert settings
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                settings:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/settings'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful upsert of settings
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        400:
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        500:
          description: Internal error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
    get:
      tags:
      - settings
      summary: List settings
      description: List all applied settings
      operationId: listSettings
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of all settings
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/settings'
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        500:
          description: Internal error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
  /settings/keys:
    get:
      tags:
      - keys
      summary: List keys
      description: List all configured keys
      operationId: listKeys
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of all keys
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/settings'
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        500:
          description: Internal error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
  /settings/keys/{key}:
    get:
      tags:
      - keys
      summary: Show key
      description: Show configured key
      operationId: showKey
      parameters:
      - name: key
        in: path
        description: Key to be shown
        required: true
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/keys-enum'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Show key
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/key-config'
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        500:
          description: Internal error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
    post:
      tags:
      - keys
      summary: Upsert key
      description: Upsert key
      operationId: upsertKey
      parameters:
      - name: key
        in: path
        description: Key to be upserted
        required: true
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/keys-enum'
      requestBody:
        description: Upsert key
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
              - object
              properties:
                object:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/key-config'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful upsert of key
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        400:
          description: Invalid request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
        500:
          description: Internal error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  content:
                    type: object
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time                    
components:
  schemas:
    keys:
      type: object
      minProperties: 1
      properties:
        key_1_in_row_1:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_2_in_row_1:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_3_in_row_1:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_1_in_row_2:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_2_in_row_2:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_3_in_row_2:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_1_in_row_3:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_2_in_row_3:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_3_in_row_3:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_1_in_row_4:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_2_in_row_4:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
        key_3_in_row_4:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key'
    key:
      type: object
      required:
        - red
        - green
        - blue
      properties:
        brightness:
          type: integer
          format: uint8
        red:
          type: integer
          format: uint8
        green:
          type: integer
          format: uint8
        blue:
          type: integer
          format: uint8
    key-config:
      type: object
      minProperties: 1
      properties:
        keydown:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/event-action-object'
        keyup:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/event-action-object'
        obs_event:
          allOf:
            - type: object
              properties:
                match:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    required:
                    - property
                    minProperties: 2
                    properties:
                      property:
                        type: string
                      string_value:
                        type: string
                      bool_value:
                        type: boolean
                      int_value:
                        type: integer
                        format: int32
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/event-action-object'
    keys-enum:
      type: string
      enum:
      - key_1_in_row_1
      - key_2_in_row_1
      - key_3_in_row_1
      - key_1_in_row_2
      - key_2_in_row_2
      - key_3_in_row_2
      - key_1_in_row_3
      - key_2_in_row_3
      - key_3_in_row_3
      - key_1_in_row_4
      - key_2_in_row_4
      - key_3_in_row_4
    settings:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        required:
        - id
        - object
        properties:
          id:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/keys-enum'
          object:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/key-config'
    event-action-object:
      type: object
      minProperties: 1
      properties:
        http:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            required:
            - method
            - url
            - headers
            - body
            properties:
              method:
                type: string
                enum:
                - get
                - post
                - put
                - delete
              url:
                type: string
              headers:
                type: object
              body:
                type: string
        obs:
          type: object
          required:
          - request
          properties:
            request:
              type: string
        led:
          type: object
          required:
          - frames
          properties:
            frames:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/keys'
